name: Daily Story With Ruben
description:
Daily Story With Ruben is a PC-run text adventure game in which players need to get real information about the world through a variety of interactions and influence the outcome of the story by making some key choices.

The goal of the game is to make players aware of human damage to the environment and stimulate their awareness of the environment while playing a real game. The game contains some violent elements.

he game is mainly aimed at players who can calm down to experience the story, have the patience to play a multi-week game in the absence of a true ending in a week to understand the game's worldview and meaning, hoping to get a sense of achievement from the text to decrypt the truth.
